name: gatus
description: Gatus is a self-hosted uptime monitoring and health check service. It supports alerting, condition-based checks, and heartbeat monitoring, displaying results in a simple dashboard. Ideal for monitoring internal and external services.
features: Service Monitoring: Track uptime and health of internal and external services with configurable check intervals.
Condition-Based Alerts: Define custom conditions and thresholds to trigger alerts via multiple channels.
Health Checks: Perform HTTP, TCP, ICMP, and DNS checks with response time and status code validation.
Dashboard View: Monitor all services at a glance through a clean, real-time status dashboard.
Heartbeat Monitoring: Detect service failures with passive heartbeat checks and timeout alerts.
Multi-Channel Alerts: Send notifications via Slack, Discord, email, PagerDuty, and other integrations.
Response Time Tracking: Monitor and visualize service response times with historical data.
Lightweight Deployment: Single binary with minimal dependencies for easy self-hosted monitoring.
